result.title: Initial Report on Standardization, Certification and Ethical aspects
result.description: The report will describe the existing and evolving international standardization landscape ISO IEC CENCENELEC ETSI and others in the areas relevant for the highly automated connected and shared mobility the involvement of partners as users observers and active contributors and the potential areas of interest for the work packages and use cases of AI4CSM This will be supported by a survey among the consortium partners The report will also cover ethical based on EC and some national recommendations and guidelines and potential certification aspects

result.title: Report on Ethics and Environmental Requirements
result.description: The report provides a discussion of the ethical environmental and genderdiversity aspects that have been considered or added while working out the detailed use cases and their requirements The report will elaborate on all these added requirements and show how they are necessary for achieving the Green Deal Trustworthy AI and an inclusive society If some requirements were considered but not added this report will give the reasoning behind this decision state the potential impact and discuss how these requirements should be considered in future developments
